name: Space Slink
description:
The humans are attempting to take over the planet. Sneak around -avoid security cameras and guards while destroying the base and take back the alien artifact that was rightfully yours! It's a space slink!

Controls

  • WASD - Move
  • Mouse - Look Around
  • E - Interact

Play full screen! (I suck at scaling) 

This was made for a game jam but I feel like it has potential to become a lengthier, puzzle/stealth adventure game. We shall see! Thanks for playing :) Feedback is more than welcome.

Assets: Kenny's Space Kit: https://www.kenney.nl/assets/space-kit

Music: https://youtu.be/eLhsu9evTvs , https://youtu.be/ilslkZ-Z5ig , https://youtu.be/Flgx7sT8m-U

SFX: https://www.kenney.nl/assets/digital-audio

Explosion particles: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/vfx/particles/simple-fx-cartoon-particles-...
